question: On Tuesday, Anna wants to exercise for thrice the amount of time he did on Monday and Sunday combined. On Sunday he exercised for 20 minutes. On Monday he exercised for 33 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Tuesday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Sunday and Monday he exercised a total of 53 minutes because 20 + 33 = <<20+33=53>>53
On Tuesday he has to exercise for 159 minutes because 53*3 = <<53*3=159>>159
#### 159
